name: test-generator-pro
description: AI-powered test generation with coverage analysis, edge case detection, and mock creation
author: @arog

ai_prompts.unit_test: Generate comprehensive unit tests for the following function. Include happy path, edge cases, error conditions, and boundary values.
ai_prompts.integration_test: Generate integration tests for the following module. Test component interactions, data flow, and API contracts.
ai_prompts.mock_generation: Generate mock data and fixtures for testing. Include realistic data, edge cases, and error scenarios.
